title: [ ERROR ] Model file .xml cannot be opened.
body:
Hi Daniil-Osokin,

Thank you for your work. I have some issues when trying to run the C++ demo. I built the human_pose_estimation_demo using openvino documentation. Then, when I run this command : `
./human_pose_estimation_demo -m /home/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/human-pose-estimation.xml -i 0`

I get the following error : 
`
InferenceEngine: 	API version ......... 2.1
	Build ........... 2021.2.0-1877-176bdf51370-releases/2021/2
Parsing input parameters
[ ERROR ] Model file /home/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/human-pose-estimation.xml cannot be opened!
`

I generated the .xxml and .bin files using your instructions, and it seems they were correctly generated. Here is the message I got after running `python3 /opt/intel/openvino_2021/deployment_tools/model_optimizer/mo.py --input_model human-pose-estimation.onnx --input data --mean_values data[128.0,128.0,128.0] --scale_values data[256] --output stage_1_output_0_pafs,stage_1_output_1_heatmaps ` :

```

Model Optimizer arguments:
Common parameters:
	- Path to the Input Model: 	/home/aladinedev2/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/human-pose-estimation.onnx
	- Path for generated IR: 	/home/aladinedev2/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/.
	- IR output name: 	human-pose-estimation
	- Log level: 	ERROR
	- Batch: 	Not specified, inherited from the model
	- Input layers: 	data
	- Output layers: 	stage_1_output_0_pafs,stage_1_output_1_heatmaps
	- Input shapes: 	Not specified, inherited from the model
	- Mean values: 	data[128.0,128.0,128.0]
	- Scale values: 	data[256]
	- Scale factor: 	Not specified
	- Precision of IR: 	FP32
	- Enable fusing: 	True
	- Enable grouped convolutions fusing: 	True
	- Move mean values to preprocess section: 	None
	- Reverse input channels: 	False
ONNX specific parameters:
Model Optimizer version: 	2021.2.0-1877-176bdf51370-releases/2021/2

[ SUCCESS ] Generated IR version 10 model.
[ SUCCESS ] XML file: /home/aladinedev2/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/./human-pose-estimation.xml
[ SUCCESS ] BIN file: /home/aladinedev2/Desktop/gitpackages/lightweight-human-pose-estimation.pytorch/./human-pose-estimation.bin
[ SUCCESS ] Total execution time: 4.24 seconds. 
[ SUCCESS ] Memory consumed: 128 MB.
```

Do you have any Idea about from where my problem could come ?
